text: 3:16 1 Korin 14:26; Efesus 5:19; Kolosi 4:63:16-17 Efesus 5:19-20Egh Kraisɨn akam ian navir averiabar ikɨ gavgafigh. Eghtɨ ia vaghvagh nɨghnɨzir aghuiba ko fofozibar gɨn mangɨva uarira uarir sure damuva akurvazir akam uari danɨng. Egh Onger Akabar Akɨnafarimɨn aven ighiabar amuva, Iesusɨn ziam fer ighiabar amuva, Godɨn Duam ian navir averiabagh atɨzir ighiabar amu. Dughiar ia ighiabar amuamim, ia uan navir averiabar God mɨnabɨ.
